title: Ranked Games
body: Is anyone else having problems loading into a ranked game? I was just in queue and it came up with the "battle is beginning" and just sat on that for a while, everyone in queue was confused and someone suggested we log back in, where it came up with the standard reconnect screen, but clicking the button did nothing.

replies.body: We finally got into the game, it was a 4v3 and at the end my entire team dced. dafuq
yea alot of people are having he same issue.. i was able to play a game fine just before then this happened... not sure whats the issue... i dont think it's patching i think it's server issue
I have this as well. Looks like something went bad with the patch.
